sentences.sentence: Study of the ceramic frits classification.
Dig into a steaming bowl of modules-frits in Brussels, Belgium.
sentences.translation: 去比利时的布鲁塞尔，来一份“蓝青口薯条”。

sentences.sentence: A few years ago, Spain becames the world leader in frits and glazes sector.
sentences.translation: 几年前，西班牙色釉料行业在世界取得了领先地位。
